document_data.caption: A map showing Selmer's Mark (labeled #9) in Suldolphor.
document_data.name: Selmer's Mark
document_data.mainbody: '''Selmer's Mark''' was a large [[tavern]] located in [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the southeast section of Suldolphor.
document_data.Activities: Selmer's Mark catered to thrifty patrons, making it a rarity in the Golden City. The tavern served basic beverages including watered [[ale]] and [[wine]]s. Unruly customers were usually thrown to the street via the shuttered windows, much to the entertainment of everyone present.
document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was owned by its namesake, [[Selmer]], in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}. All of the servers in Selmer's Mark were children who worked for room and board.
